alert.note: Alert for Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 8:10PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Ziebach, northeastern Meade and southeastern Perkins Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 810 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles west of Durkee Lake, or 5 miles southwest of Faith, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Durkee Lake around 815 PM MDT. Faith around 825 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Arrow Head Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Ziebach
